content.text: Match ends, Espanyol 0, Barcelona 3.
Second Half ends, Espanyol 0, Barcelona 3.
Offside, Espanyol. Javi López tries a through ball, but Gerard Moreno is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Attempt saved. Neymar (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Luis Suárez with a through ball.
Attempt saved. Leo Baptistao (Espanyol) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by David López.
Goal!  Espanyol 0, Barcelona 3. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner.
Víctor Sánchez (Espanyol) wins a free kick on the left wing.
